title: 579 1 "Arriving! A Burning Island - Punk Hazard!"Transliteration: "Jōriku! Moeru Shima Panku Hazādo" (Japanese:上陸！燃える島パンクハザード) Directed by: Ayako HiraikeStoryboarded by:Naoyuki Itō Tomohiro Nakayama January 6, 2013(2013-01-06) September 4, 2022
transformers_text: 579 1 Arriving A Burning Island Punk Hazard Transliteration J riku Moe ru Shima Pan ku H az do Japanese Directed by Aya ko Hira ike Story boarded by Nao yuki It Tomohiro Nakayama January 6 2013 2013 01 06 September 4 2022 After the events of Film Z The Straw Hats arrive at a volcanic island that does not appear on the New World Log Pose Luffy in his enthusiasm votes to go to the island though most of his crew are reluctant to go with him The crew than receives a distress call from someone on the island who is being attacked by a samurai They then draw sticks on who will go with Luffy and who will stay on the ship with Zoro Robin and Us opp coming with Luffy With the help of Nami's clouds the scouting group arrives at the main entrance which Zoro cuts down with ease The group wanders the area seeing the whole place on fire wondering what happened to the island Their exploration is suddenly cut short when they encounter a dragon looking hungrily at them At Rai j in Island Smoker and T as hig i intercept the distress call that Luffy picked up and order the G 5 Marines to set a course for Punk Hazard
